validate_fs_directory.path_doesnt_exist: The path you've selected doesn't exist
validate_fs_directory.invalid_path: Please make sure you've selected your Community folder

get_active_feed.fetch_fail: Failed to fetch current feed from API.
get_active_feed.fetch_fail_article_text:
Failed to fetch article. If this continues, [report this to the developers](https://github.com/MSFS-Mega-Pack/MSFS2020-livery-manager/issues/new).

Info: `fetch` failed in `GetActiveFeed.js`

get_feed_history.fetch_fail: Failed to fetch current feed from API.
get_feed_history.fetch_fail_article_text:
Failed to fetch article. If this continues, [report this to the developers](https://github.com/MSFS-Mega-Pack/MSFS2020-livery-manager/issues/new).

Info: `fetch` failed in `GetActiveFeed.js`

main_app.heading: An error occurred
main_app.description: An error occurred while loading the manager. This error has been reported to the app developers.
main_app.suggestions: Try restarting the manager. If that doesn't work, click the button below to reset your manager settings.

welcome_page.heading: Welcome to the {{app_name}}
welcome_page.description: We need to go through a few brief setup stages before you can use the liveries manager, just to give you the best experience and to make sure everything goes according to plan.

locale_page.heading: Select your language
locale_page.description: All languages are community translations. Please report all translation errors on GitHub.
locale_page.help_translate_link: Why not help translate the manager into your language?

community_directory.heading: Find your community folder
community_directory.description: Please check that the directory below matches your community folder. If it doesn't, choose the correct folder with the browse button.

complete_page.heading: Setup complete
complete_page.description2: Click 'Finish' to confirm your settings and launch the manager.

update_available.tooltip: Go to 'Installed Liveries' to update this livery

installed.tooltip: To uninstall, update, or reinstall, head to the Installed Liveries tab

refresh_box.last_refreshed_explanation_tooltip: When you last checked for installed and available liveries

tooltip.rate_limited: Rate limiting is in effect: you must wait {{interval}}s between refreshes

offline_error.title: You're offline
offline_error.paragraph1: This app needs an internet connection to function. Double check your network.
offline_error.paragraph2: This message will automatically dismiss when you regain connection.

no_more_posts.heading: That's all, folks!
no_more_posts.info: You've reached the end of the update feed

errors.generic_message: An error occurred while loading the news feed
errors.feed_unknown: The Feed data fetched from the API was invalid. (null_err)

installed_addons_fail.title: Couldn't find installed liveries.
installed_addons_fail.error_text: We couldn't fetch the list of installed liveries. Have you moved or deleted your community folder?
installed_addons_fail.suggestion1: The path you told us is {{path}}. Is this correct?
installed_addons_fail.suggestion2: Try updating your community folder in Settings.

progress_notifications.install_failed: {{fails}} [[fails||livery|liveries]] failed to install. The team has been notified.

version.title: Version
version.tooltip: This text represents the current version of the livery which is available. If your version differs from this, it means a new update is available.

installed_liveries.warning_cannot_remove_multiple_liveries: At the moment, you can't remove or update multiple liveries at a time. Don't worry because this will be coming in a future update.

progress_notifications.update_failed: {{fails}} [[fails||livery|liveries]] failed to update. The team has been notified.

snackbar.hold_to_remove: To remove a livery, click and hold its delete button for {{time}} seconds

notification.no_liveries_to_remove: You don't have any installed liveries!

deletion.fail1: Failed to remove livery: no obj passed
deletion.fail2: Failed to remove livery: unknown location
deletion.fail3: Failed to remove livery: folder not found
deletion.fail5: Failed to remove livery: unknown error

notification.no_liveries_to_update: You don't have any installed liveries!

uninstall_all.title: Remove all liveries?
uninstall_all.message: Are you sure you want to uninstall ALL YOUR LIVERIES?
uninstall_all.detail: Once you start this process, you cannot pause or cancel it. To get your liveries back, you need to reinstall them.

update_all.title: Update all liveries?
update_all.message: Are you sure you want to update ALL YOUR LIVERIES?
update_all.detail: Once you start this process, you cannot pause or cancel it.

no_liveries_installed.info:
We couldn't find any mega pack liveries in your selected Community folder.

If you installed liveries through the mega pack zip, they will not appear here. They must be installed via the manager.

advanced_settings.dialog_detail: Only do this if instructed to by a developer. This may have unintended consequences. You have been warned!

footer.line1: {{appName}} — Created for the Liveries Mega Pack
footer.source_repo_and_license: View the source code and license

settings.errors_in_inputs: Please fix the error(s) above before saving

cache_clear.name: Caching
cache_clear.clearing_cache_notification: Clearing cache. This might take a few minutes.

reset_manager_to_defaults.name: Reset manager
reset_manager_to_defaults.detail: This will reset all app settings and restart the manager. You won't lose any installed liveries, and any liveries that are already installed will be automatically re-detected.
